document: UTILIZATION AND VIEWS OF AVAILABLE HEALTH CARE AMONG RESIDENTS IN THREE POVERTY NEIGHBORHOODS IN PITTSBURGH, PENNSYLVANIA By Earl Donald Hollander B.A., Yeshiva University, 1957 M.S., Simmons College, 1960 Submitted to the Graduate Faculty in the School of Social Work in partial fulfillment of the requirements for the degree of Doctor of Philosophy University of Pittsburgh 1970
